title: (2100-201) Coruche -

description:
parking lot.

Very nice, quiet and clean.
We stayed 1 night without any problem
Good views. Practically within the locality. By the market, cafes, etc.

title: (2100) Coruche - Coruche
description: Parking of ten seats very quiet! I advise you when the market does not take place because of service taken by the market !!

title: () Coruche - Coruche
description: Area for motorhomes with all amenities! Store next door! Large river and with picnic areas and games for children! Near a bullring.

title: (2100) Coruche - 5 N251
description: Parking in the village church, noisy day and night, no fence height, far from the center, rather quiet, we spent the night with no problem with trash and drinking fountain beside

title: (2100) Coruche - Caminho do Monte do Açude
title_short: (2100) Coruche - Caminho do Monte do Açude

name: Área Serviço Autocaravanas da Erra
title: (2100) Área Serviço Autocaravanas da Erra
description: Installation specially designed for motorhomes. Part of an outdoor "pay" parking network. Check the website on the information board at the entrance. Google will probably take you down a dirt road with a narrow bridge. Suggest finding an alternate route if you have a large vehicle. On the edge of a quiet village.

name: Quinta Centro Lusitano Portugal
title: (2100) Quinta Centro Lusitano Portugal
description:
Nice place in the middle off nature. 
The owner is a host of workaway.info.
so you can park here in exchange for your farm help!
Phone number available to Pro subscribers
we do not provide any electricity and water...
u only work for a place where u can stand.

title: (2120-194) Foros de Salvaterra -
description: Nice sandy spot by the lake and with trees for shade. Some level spots. Nice and quiet, the road is not busy at night. Enjoyed a nice peaceful rest here.

title: (2120-194) Foros de Salvaterra - Unnamed Road
description: Amazing view, quiet, WC on the  restaurant

title: (2125) Glória do Ribatejo -
description: Very quiet place up on a hill with a beautiful view on the typical landscape of the Charneca Ribatjana. It’s a perfect place for relaxing and going straight from your van to nature. It’s a family place and an organic farm where olives trees have been growing for a hundred years. You’ll have access to bathroom and shower. Possibility of electricity and laundries.

title: (2125) Marinhais - IC3
description: Parking next to a very quiet and spacious gas station.

title: (2080) Raposa - 1 IC10
description: Parque de Merendas, a picnic area surrounded by nature , a little paradise by the bridge & in between two rivers...frogs in the stream and storks in the nests... nearby main road might get a bit noisy during the day , ideal for some rest, do a picnic ( tables, benches, bbq areas, wc on location) , maybe even for an overnight stay ...village just meters away

title: (2130) Santo Estevão - Rua Direita
description: A very quiet place to spend the night. In my opinion much better than the other place around here, since it is not the access road to a property. Only in the morning did a car come by. Please leave it as clean as you found it!

title: (2080) - IC10
description: Potable Water source

title: (2125-120) Marinhais - Estrada Nacional 367
description: Intermarché motorhome service point. Free water and dumping station. Cheap diesel station and large selection of gas bottles available.

title: (2130) Santo Estevão - Unnamed Road
description: Small location along a road with little traffic (cul de sac). We spent the night here, and only two cars passed. Pleasant location and peaceful night, but without any service.

title: (2120) Salvaterra de Magos - 107 N114
description: Self-service weighbridge.

title: (2100) Couço - 36 Rua do Comercio
description: Charming circular parking lot near N4 and very close to the village of Courço. Two free water terminals picnic tables and play area for children. Garbage cans in the tuff car park opposite. Very peaceful night!

title: (2100) Couço - Ponte de Santa Justa
description: Good place for the night and the rest, at the edge of the river and the garden.

name: Parque de Campismo do Escaroupim
title: (2125) Parque de Campismo do Escaroupim
description: Quiet not far from the river. Restorantje in camping. Good price. Decently.

title: (2120) Salvaterra de Magos - 3 Largo dos Avieiros
title_short: (2120) Salvaterra de Magos - 3 Largo dos Avieiros
description: Quiet corner at the water's edge at the port of Escaroupim, flat, picnic table in the shade, ideal for spending the night in peace.

title: (2140) Cantarinhas - Unnamed Road
description: I spent at ease with my 10T, 3 days in the pampas without seeing a cat;]

title: (2120-013) Salvaterra de Magos -
description: Great place between a field and a river. Ideal for a day or a night in the middle of nature. 10 min walk from a small restaurant and boat trip along the river. Very beautiful sunset.

title: (2120-092) Salvaterra de Magos - 201 N118
description: Easy access direct from N 118 main road inside small town, with flat illuminated and free P without shadows and free service area. Picnic tables on bottom. Inside town so several shopping and supermarket around. If you like bullfighting, here is main event; also works with hawks (search “Falcoaria Real”). The area is safe but noisy mainly in working days as just aside main road and also main roundpoint with many trucks traffic. For quiet overnight, choose “Cais da Vala Real” near small marina (1,2 km N top of town).

title: (2070-516) Valada - 55 Rua Primeiro de Maio
description: Very large parking at the edge of the Tagus, free with toilets, damage showers do not work, many picnic tables, children's game, bar at the small port next door, quiet, easy access, to be recommended ...

title: (2985) Canha - N10
description: An abandoned village. If you enjoy roaming lost places this is a good spot to have a stopover for some lunch or just to roam the old residential quarter including a church.

name: Cais da Vala Real
title: (2120) Cais da Vala Real
description: Flat illuminated free gravel parking at opposite site of small marina and small arm of Tejo river. Quiet for overnight. No shadows. No services.

title: (2130) Benavente - 5 Rua Álvaro Rodrigues de Azevedo
title_short: (2130) Benavente - 5 Rua Álvaro Rodrigues de Azevedo
description: Free Park, could park the motorhome No water or WC. The near station is at Intermarché Benavente 2 km from here

title: (2130) Benavente - N118
description: Nice space next to the ditch with a bar next door.

title: (2130) Benavente -
description: Nice place just outside of a village and right next to a fairground. Directly on the river with a path that invites you to take a long walk. Plenty of space for several, even larger, mobiles. The place is level. Access should be via the town center. The night was very quiet and lonely.

title: (2130) Benavente - N118
description: Lavanteria, wash and dry at intermarche.

title: (2120) Salvaterra de Magos -
description: Nice riverside beach, with picnic tables and barbecue spots.

title: (2120-097) Salvaterra de Magos - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area by the lake, with a river running to the next town. Very quiet. Here you could also spend a quiet night. Please take your rubbish with you as there are no rubbish bins.

title: (2080) Almeirim - Avenida D Joáo I

Nothing special just a easy parking spot for a night.

name: O Torricado

Quinta Dalhia welcomes you.
25 minutes from Lisbon and the sea.
Approaching National 4.
In large private house with large wooded park, swimming pool and bathroom available.
Rent pitches for camping car 3 or 4 max.
most: welcome and sympathy.

Possibility laundry with supplement.

title: (7050) Ciborro - Largo do Povo
description: Small public parking, leveled and illuminated, on upper top of “Largo do Povo” square in CIBORRO village, 50m away from road EN 2. Parking free on evening and night, usually, enough for 2 or 3 motorhomes. Quiet during night. It lies 100m away from iconic km 500 of tourist road track EN 2 and associated bar/restaurant. There is also fuel station on the road and small dam (= “barragem”). Dam is 1,5 km away by good gravel road; nice to a very quiet night and stars watching. Public toilets, clean, 250m to S (in small blue&white garden).

title: (2985) Pegões - 388 N4
description: Free parking. Bar next to the parking. Good for 1 night. Tip the security guard or buy a beer. Relatively quiet. Lorry and camper van parking.

title: (7490) Mora - Rua do Barco
description: River beach of Mora, fishing possible, swimming in summer, picnic table, barbecue. Quiet, calm by the river. To avoid in rainy weather because not tarred. Accessible to all sizes of motorhome.

title: (2070-085) Cartaxo - 2 Rua do Progresso
description: Easy parking. But right next to Lidl.

title: (7490-225) Mora - 6 Rua da Estação
description: The museum car park was the only straight car park I found in Mora. There is a small parking lane parallel to the road just in front of the entrance of the museum (that's where I parked) and about 15-20 parking spaces across the road, which can be used with a not too long van. Since the campsite I drove to was closed, I also parked here. No problems and quiet (until the neighbor's rooster started crowing). There is a café on the right at the end of the museum, waste bins and a small park behind the museum.

title: (2050-271) Azambuja - 33 Urbanização Serrado do Barroso
description: Small, quiet car park away from traffic noise located between the arena (praçia de touros) and the gymnasium. Close to the village, near an Aldi supermarket, perfect for a night stopover.

title: (2070-107) Cartaxo - 40 Rua Manuel Bernardo das Neves

description:
Public parking lot

with WiFi , very calm and with restaurants and coffee nearby

title: (7425) Montargil - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful corner isolated from the world here at Montargil dam. Silence, lake to swim, eagles flying around, great bird watching and the best part no one around. If you come here be respectful and don’t make fires or trash the place.Bumpy road with sharp turns must be hard if wet but we came in summer so it was dry. A big fig tree close by if you are lucky to be here on the right season for it.

title: (7425) Montargil - 71 Rua Heróis do Ultramar
description: Quiet for overnight stay

description: Public free park next to a road... 1 night and no problems. Nice view a few meters from the park

title: (2090) Alpiarça - Unnamed Road

Grátis e sem Serviços. Dentro do parque da Cidade. Local calmo, tranquilo, seguro e com diversos serviços ao redor. Lojas diversas, bancos, snack-bar, parque infantil. A 15 minutos a pé do centro da Cidade.

Free and without Services. Inside the City Park. Quiet, quiet, safe and with various services around. Various shops, banks, snack bar, children's playground. 15 minutes walk from the city center.

title: (2005) Santarém - 6 Rua Bairro Camarário
description: Quiet zone, near habitation, shopping and fast food

description: Nice place, close to the water, with some shade.

title: (2005) - Autoestrada do Norte
description: Simple subdivision with its parking spaces in a deserted artisanal area that has never found its customers. Valid for resting only with a slight noise from the motorway at night, intensifying with the traffic in the morning. Illuminated at night, no car passing. The places are flat or almost with a cycle track and pedestrian that the grass tries to take again…. Very large motorhomes can park without problem. No shade in summer.

title: (7425) Montargil - Unnamed Road
description: Awesome place to relax. Easy road. Easy access

title: (7490) Pavia - N251
description: Portugal, Évora district, Alentejo region, somewhere between Mora and Pavia. We could not just pass the signpost to the dolmen of 'Cromeleque das Fontainhas'. The first pictures show why our decision was made quickly, this will be our bedroom for tonight. No service.

title: (2005) Santarém - 2 Rua Professor Américo Marinho
description: Large, paved parking lot at Parque Aquatico Santatrem. Indoor pool open 10am - 7pm. Large outdoor area only from June to September. Stayed 2-3 days, no service except dumpsters. Very quiet at night, otherwise swimming. Parking space for AC planned.

title: (2600) - N10
description: Repsol petrol station. Water available at the tire pressure level. Free

title: (2005) - N365
description: Water source to top up. don't know if it's drinkable

title: (2600) Castanheira do Ribatejo - 37 Rua Prudêncio Duarte Correira
title_short: (2600) Castanheira do Ribatejo - 37 Rua Prudêncio Duarte Correira
description: Nice place to rest, have a barbecue. No amenities

name: ESA (Estação de Serviço Autocaravanas)
title: (7490) ESA (Estação de Serviço Autocaravanas)
description: ESA (Estação de Serviço Autocaravanas). Close to the Mora fluviario. Small campsite with all amenities and service area for motorhomes.

title: (7490) Cabeção -
description: Nice plateau for motorhomes separated from the campsite with the possibility of emptying and filling up with water. Very friendly caretaker, speaks a little French but very good in English. Very calm place.

title: (7425) Montargil - N2
description:
Praia Fluvial do Pintadinho. Just ov
er the lake outside Orbitur permisses. Stayed a night and great for morning dive, but also during holidays on a Monday. Enjoy!

title: (2005) Santarém - 103 N3
description: Gravel Park Place, open day and night for everybody, during the day traffic near the N3, during the night quiet, not so busy like in Santarem, looking safe over night. Lot of space, no services. Some little stores, gas station and restaurants near the place, big grocery stores like Pingo Doce not so far, also Decatlon big store 2 km nearby.

name: Parque de Campismo Orbitur Montargil
title: () Parque de Campismo Orbitur Montargil
description: 4 km north of the village of Montargil, this Orbitur Group campsite is located on the banks of a huge artificial lake. Pleasant and well equipped certainly, but without soul. Lots of chalets, mobile homes and rather young locals who get together on weekends to play the guitar and party with a beer in hand! Swimming pool, bar / snacks, convenience store, excellent wifi connection in the area reserved for motorhomes and TV reception without problem. Quality sanitary facilities and very well maintained.

title: (2050) Aveiras de Cima - 122 Rua do Relógio
title_short: (2050) Aveiras de Cima - 122 Rua do Relógio
description: FREE clean water can be charged. The socket is next to the air, you have to squeeze the black nozzle and the water comes out.

title: (7425) Montargil - N2
description: Perfect place to spend an afternoon. We have been alone all day. It seems like a quiet place to spend the night. Narrow track access, better with a van.

name: Le Jasmin Etoilé
title: (2070-352) Le Jasmin Etoilé
description: 2-3 places for camper or caravan. Water, electricity, cassette and gray water evacuation, sink. Shops nearby: grocery store, fruit and vegetables, bar. Once a week: butcher and fishmonger. Cash machine. Pets accepted. If booking a minimum of one week, we take you to the supermarket for free for your purchases. Possibility to rent a kitchen tent with two pieces of furniture and an induction hob for a minimum of one week.

title: (2965) - E90
description: Gas station service area with toilets, showers, water intake, picnic area, children's area and cafeteria. Suitable for a short stop and fill the tank with clean water

title: (2140) - 2 N243
description:
At the entrance to the village of Chouto Nationale 243, new motorhome area, gray and black water drainage, water tap, 12 electricity outlets (currently disabled).
200 meters from the center where there is pharmacy, restaurants, small supermarket.
Quiet, easy access to any size motorhome.
On-site garbage can is very small but just outside the gate is a bigger blue bin that is also a garbage can (see last photo).

title: (7080) Vendas Novas - A6
description: Rest area at Repsol station. Indicated its use as a parking lot for caravans. Toilets and sinks available, picnic tables as well. We slept there, feeling safe next to the gas station and 24 hour cafeteria. NOTICE: The maximum stay on Portuguese motorways is 12 hours. By sleeping in the area, we exceeded this limit and had to pay for the journey from Lisbon to the border. It's not the domain's fault, and therefore for me 5*

title: (2000) Vale de Figueira - Unnamed Road
description: Shaded site at the end of a rural road with a source (uncontrolled) on the edge of a tributary of the Tagus

title: () Santarém - Unnamed Road
description: Here you can stand 4x4 in the riverbed, close to the water or up next to the path where it can be Dusty but if cars drive past. On the weekend possibly heavily visited by the locals. Our stay mid oct during the week was very pleasantly quiet.

title: (7490) Cabeção - Unnamed Road
description: Flat land in the forest on a paved road, a little deformed by tree roots but widely practicable by all types of vehicles. This path stops at the level of a house that seems abandoned or perhaps a second home ... Very quiet, I was able to fall asleep with songs of locusts and / or cicadas in the distance. In the middle of the night, an animal came to pay me a visit around surely a hare; which woke me up but nothing bad. Thanks to this little stealthy alarm clock, I could hear an owl or an owl that was flying in the distance. And in the morning, it was very nice to wake up with different bird songs .. I highly recommend !!!

title: (2600-610) Castanheira do Ribatejo - 27 Rua de Padre António Bianchi
title_short: (2600-610) Castanheira do Ribatejo - 27 Rua de Padre António Bianchi
description: Quiet parking to spend the night, next to the road touching the urbanization

title_short: (2600) Vila Franca de Xira - Ponte Marechal Carmona
description: Small place for vans and small campers. View of the river. we only stopped for a short lunch break, possibly also overnight. Road / bridge right next to it, therefore slight driving noise. apparently parking for anglers.

title: (7490) Cabeção - Unnamed Road
description: Cool place, near a road. Super quite. Great place to see the sunrise and sunset

title: (7425) Montargil - N2
description: Breathtaking, breathtaking, magnificent views over the lake. Complete silence with nature all around. Great place to watch the stars and sunrise, RVs are forbidden

name: Quinta Lusco-Fusco
title: (2890) Quinta Lusco-Fusco
description: Quinta Lusco-Fusco is a private rural farm lets stay overnight for travelers by van, tent, bike, backpack, camping under the stars, in the shade of the cork oak, listening to the birds, seeing the farm animals. It is just 30 minutes from Lisbon. Only cold shower. Call before arrival.

title: (2600-209) Vila Franca de Xira - 6 N1
description: Intermarché gas station, with washing machine

title: (7425) Montargil - N2
description: Easy access, great shades and awesome view. Perfect for small campervans. In front of the water.

description:

title_short: (2600) Vila Franca de Xira - 32 Rua Joaquim Pedro Monteiro
description: At the end of a dead end. Wide and little traffic. Parking on the roadside. Town, shops within walking distance, few 100 m.

title: (7425) Montargil -

name: Camping

title_short: (2600) Vila Franca de Xira - 12 Rua Bica do Chinelo

description: Beach overlooking Lisbon. A beach bar, showers and foot baths, sports equipment and free wi fi. Place where to park the motorhome 50 m from the beach. I think there will be no problem with the overnight stay. This area should be avoided from the 9th to the 16th of August, at least for parking or overnight accommodation of vehicles that can cause traffic problems, since at that time the festivities of the land (parties of Barrete Verde) take place. Moreover, they can park in the surroundings and go to the party by other means, since they are very beautiful and traditional parties. In June, the parrot festival takes place on this beach.

name: Camping Vasco da Gama
title: () Camping Vasco da Gama
description: It is a natural permanent campsite where people live all year round. The rear part in the pine forest is reserved for tourists. Motorhome, mobile home, caravan or tent Pitch of your choice. Everything is fenced, the gate is closed from 00:00. Until then arrival is possible. You pay 24 hours. Disposal of chemical toilets is possible. Super clean sanitary facilities, but no glasses or paper. The water in the shower is very hot and flows continuously. In summer there is a swimming pool. There is a small private animal park with poultry, a pond and a garden. There are picnic areas and additional barbecue areas. Pets are allowed.

name: Quinta das Kopas
title: (2955-252) Quinta das Kopas
description:
Check-in 12:00-21:00     |    Check-out 7h30-14h00

Quinta das Kopas is a little private rural farm where you can stay in the middle of the fruit trees.
Excellent location to visit Lisbon as it is only 30 minutes from Lisbon by train. The station is just 2 km away and we will drop you off and pick you up for free.
We have facilities such as hot water showers, toilets, place to wash dishes, barbecue, washing machine, washing line, a gym and a living room (with tv and board games), as well as places to dump and refill water (only for those who sleep on the farm).
There is also a small warm salt water pool, about 33º (different hours for adults and children) and a jacuzzi if you really want to get completely relaxed.
You can also rest, read, listen to music or even sleep on the hammocks or in other seating and lying areas of our garden. But if your idea is to be a little more active, you can play our outdoor games.
Sociable pets are welcome (free of charge) but must always be on a leash and cannot be in the common interior spaces (vaccination card required).
We also have a mobile home for travelers without a motorhome or friends of our guests.
Quinta das Kopas was designed to welcome friends from different countries who want to take a break from their journey and enjoy Portuguese nature and hospitality.
Please come with google maps to make it easier to reach the gate. It is on a dead-end street and is the first gate on the left with the nameplate on the wall. (Attention: waze does not bring you to the gate).
Please check prices.

Reservation is not mandatory, but if you really want to secure your place, it would be better to get in touch with us because our capacity is per person.

Have a nice trip to you!
